title: The Fiend
content:
Simple Weapon Proficiency Choose 2 Skill Proficiencies Pact Magic

The Fiend is a Subclass of Warlock in Baldur's Gate 3. The Fiend's primary ability is Charisma, their saving throw proficiencies are Wisdom & Charisma and they have a Hit Dice of 1d8. They have proficiency with Simple weapons and with Light Armour.

Warlocks in service to fiends work towards corrupting, destructive ends - intentionally or otherwise - and receive hellish blessings in turn.

BG3 Warlock Class Features
